On Tue, 18 May 2004, jirleech wrote:

|javascript links, and timingout on some sites.  Also I am going to be
|using lucene to index the sites after acquistion, so a full java
|implementation would be very benificial.

Miles (cc'd above) has been working on some code that makes Heritrix play
nice with Lucene.  Perhaps you guys could talk about whether his code will
work for your purposes.  

Perhaps this is also a good time to ask (Gordon?) whether it's worth
making an effort to make it easy to use Heritrix to mirror and/or tie into
Lucene for indexing.  It looks like several people have already identified
these as a needs and started coding independently.  Making this something
that's configurable would probably make Heritrix useful to a much broader
audience and hopefully encourage contributions in other areas.

Thanks,

pt.
